hero.badge: Employees from Poland, Ukraine and Moldova
hero.description: <brand>Raw Job</brand> is a recruitment agency connecting employers with qualified workers. No matter which side you are on – we have a solution for <you>you</you>.

employers.title: Looking for employees?
employers.descriptionLine1: Do you want to streamline your hiring process and reduce employment costs?
employers.descriptionLine3: We provide comprehensive process outsourcing and recruitment tailored to your needs.

bullets.legalization: Full legalization of residence and work

jobSeekers.title: Looking for a job?
jobSeekers.descriptionLine1: Are you looking for stable employment in Poland?
jobSeekers.descriptionLine2: We help workers from <poland>Poland</poland>, <ukraine>Ukraine</ukraine> and <moldova>Moldova</moldova> find suitable jobs and provide support at every stage.

bullets.legalization: Assistance with residence and work legalization

offer.heading: Our Offer
offer.title: Looking for employees?
offer.description: We provide a full range of services related to recruitment, legalization and employment.

outsourcing.title: Process outsourcing
outsourcing.description: Cooperation based on process outsourcing. We take full responsibility for the entire recruitment and employment process.

legalization.title: Residence and work legalization
legalization.description: Complete legalization process for foreign workers from Ukraine and Moldova. From declarations to residence cards.

legalService.title: Legal services
legalService.description: Comprehensive legal support for employing foreign workers – declarations, permits, visas and residence cards. We prepare documents and submit applications on your behalf.

highEmployment.title: High employment stability
highEmployment.description: Maintaining a high level of employment through continuous workforce monitoring and fast response to changing needs.

postSupport.title: Post-employment support
postSupport.description: We don’t stop at recruitment. We provide ongoing support after employment, helping workers adapt to their new positions.

training.title: H&S training and certifications
training.description: Workplace Health & Safety training, forklift licenses, UDT certifications and high-bay warehouse qualifications, and more.

outsourcingInfo.title: What is process outsourcing?
outsourcingInfo.description: Process outsourcing is a management strategy in which a company delegates selected business processes to an external service provider. The goal is to increase efficiency, focus on core competencies and optimize operational costs.

forWho.title: Who is it for?
forWho.description: This solution works perfectly across many industries – from manufacturing, where we specialize, to logistics, hospitality and seasonal industries.

about.heading: About us
about.title: Your partner in recruitment and employment
about.description: We are a company specializing in recruitment and employment of Polish and foreign workers for businesses across various industries. We ensure that our clients receive candidates tailored to their specific needs and requirements. We provide dedicated support through a bilingual coordinator to guarantee smooth and effective communication.
